modName: A simple Kill the Legates mod
summary: Removes the essential tag of Imperial Legates and Stormcloaks Leaders via scripting
descriptionHtml:
This is a very simple mod that removes the essential tag of the Imperial legates and Stormcloaks leaders and replaces it with the protected flag via scripting, this way only the player can kill them.

[b]What\'s the difference between this mod and the others?[/b]
The other mods modify the base actors to remove the essential flag, this causes incompatibility with other mods that modify those actors and is only compatible with the modder\'s language.

This mod changes the flag via scripting, base actors are [b]not[/b] touched, so anyone in any language can use it.

[b]How to use the mod[/b]
- Install the mod
- Load your game
- Save your game

Once you have saved your game you can delete the mod, as the flag removal will be saved in your savegame. Note that [b]the change is permanent[/b], once you have saved your game with the mod installed there is no turning back.


--Enjoy the mod
pauderek
author: pauderek
